Name: Lesson for Kids: What is a Landmark? - Definition & Facts
Subject: ['teaching and classroom resources', 'family and parenting', 'homework and study tips', 'education', 'children']
Description: There are landmarks across the world that hold great importance. In this lesson, you will learn about what a landmark is and facts about some of the most well-known landmarks in the United States and other countries.
